players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie is dead! This is terrible. We need to figure out who did this. I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
You: "Diana is the mafia. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. We need to vote to arrest her now before she kills again."
Diana: "Diana is innocent! Alice is trying to frame me without proof. Why would I kill Charlie so openly? Alice sounds suspicious trying to rush the vote."
You: "Diana is lying to protect herself. I am the detective and I have proof she is mafia. We can’t afford to wait and risk another kill."

Bob: "Alice claims to be the detective and says Diana is mafia. Diana denies this and points out Alice is rushing the vote. I'm a villager, so I don't have any special information. We need to be careful about who we trust."

Diana: "Diana has nothing to gain by killing Charlie so openly. Alice's insistence and rush to vote for me smell like a ploy to eliminate a town member quickly. Let's take our time and think this through."

Alice was arrested
